198  {
199  FLOAT32 Slope, Intercept, Normalizer;
200 
201  Slope = tan (Proto->Angle * 2.0 * PI);
202  Intercept = Proto->Y - Slope * Proto->X;
203  Normalizer = 1.0 / sqrt (Slope * Slope + 1.0);
204  Proto->A = Slope * Normalizer;
205  Proto->B = -Normalizer;
